message:
Running command: cat > /workspace/reproduce_issue.py << 'PY'
"""Reproduction script for category empty-data deprecation warning.
This script loads the local matplotlib.category module directly (to avoid
importing the package which requires compiled extensions) and calls
StrCategoryConverter.convert with an empty sequence. We convert
MatplotlibDeprecationWarning to errors to detect any deprecation warn.
"""
import warnings
from importlib.machinery import SourceFileLoader
from pathlib import Path

# Load the module directly from file
mod_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1] / 'matplotlib' / 'lib' / 'matplotlib' / 'category.py'
category = SourceFileLoader('category', str(mod_path)).load_module()

# Convert Matplotlib deprecation warnings to errors
warnings.filterwarnings('error', category=category._api.deprecation.MatplotlibDeprecationWarning)

unit = category.UnitData(["a", "b"])
conv = category.StrCategoryConverter()

print('Calling convert with empty list...')
res = conv.convert([], unit, None)
print('Result:', res, 'dtype:', getattr(res, 'dtype', type(res)))
print('No deprecation warning raised for empty input — PASS')
PY

args.command:
cat > /workspace/reproduce_issue.py << 'PY'
"""Reproduction script for category empty-data deprecation warning.
This script loads the local matplotlib.category module directly (to avoid
importing the package which requires compiled extensions) and calls
StrCategoryConverter.convert with an empty sequence. We convert
MatplotlibDeprecationWarning to errors to detect any deprecation warn.
"""
import warnings
from importlib.machinery import SourceFileLoader
from pathlib import Path

# Load the module directly from file
mod_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1] / 'matplotlib' / 'lib' / 'matplotlib' / 'category.py'
category = SourceFileLoader('category', str(mod_path)).load_module()

# Convert Matplotlib deprecation warnings to errors
warnings.filterwarnings('error', category=category._api.deprecation.MatplotlibDeprecationWarning)

unit = category.UnitData(["a", "b"])
conv = category.StrCategoryConverter()

print('Calling convert with empty list...')
res = conv.convert([], unit, None)
print('Result:', res, 'dtype:', getattr(res, 'dtype', type(res)))
print('No deprecation warning raised for empty input — PASS')
PY
